landing.hero_subtitle: Easily manage licenses for your software products with our robust and customizable solution.
landing.feature_licenses_desc: Easily create and manage license keys for your software.
landing.feature_api_desc: Integrate our API with your applications to verify licenses in real-time.
landing.feature_updates_desc: Control access to updates based on your customers' license levels.
landing.testimonial_1_text: AdminLicense has transformed how we manage licenses. Simple and effective!
landing.testimonial_2_text: The API is easy to integrate and we've reduced license issues by 90%.
landing.testimonial_3_text: I 100% recommend it for reliability and ease of use.
landing.faq_a1: Our API verifies license validity in real-time via a simple HTTP request.
landing.faq_q2: Can I migrate from another system?
landing.faq_a2: Yes, we offer import tools to facilitate migration from other platforms.
landing.faq_q3: What payment methods do you accept?
landing.faq_a3: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for businesses.
landing.faq_a4: Technical support is available via email and ticket. Premium customers benefit from priority support.

license.title: License Management
license.no_details: No detailed information available for this license key.
license.key_saved_in_env: This key will be saved in your application's .env file.
license.env_not_exists: The .env file doesn't exist yet. It will be created automatically.
license.manual_verification_desc: You can force an immediate verification of the installation license. This will update the validity status and associated information.
